availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

body.p: Henry County, Kentucky, farmer. Henry County, Kentucky, native. Married to Jackobina Meadows Tingle. Father of Gabriel Tingle, Mary Tingle, Susan Tingle, Martha Tingle, Sarah Tingle, James W. Tingle, Letitia Tingle, Iverson Tingle, William Tingle, Samuel Tingle, and Louis Tingle. Farmer in Henry County in 1850. Farmer in Henry County in 1860.

ab.bibl:
Seventh Manuscript Census of the United States (1850), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Henry County, District No. 1, p. 384A.
Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Henry County, Subdivision No. 1, p. 256.
Tenth Manuscript Census of the United States (1880), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Henry County, Port Royal Magisterial District, p. 80A.
Kentucky Death Certificates, 1911-1965, Kentucky Office of Vital Statistics, KDLA, Frankfort, KY, File 25488.
"Elisha Tingle (1819-1900)," Find A Grave, Memorial 28381579, Accessed July 15, 2022, https://www.findagrave.com/memorial/28381579/elisha-tingle.
